Package io.fluo.api.observer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    Implemented by users to a watch a Column and be notified of changes to the Column via the Observer.process(TransactionBase, Bytes, Column) method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractObserver
    Implemented by users to a watch a Column and be notified of changes to the Column via the Observer.process(TransactionBase, Bytes, Column) method.
    Observer.ObservedColumn
    A Column and Observer.NotificationType pair
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Observer.NotificationType
